title: "I can’t wait for artificial intelligence to take this job away from humans"
excerpt: "Adults have to do a lot of unpleasant jobs; it’s part of the gig. Taking out the trash, cleaning the toilet and making the daily school run are unavoidable when it comes to keeping life running smoothly. But there’s one particular job that fills me with dread: calling a “helpline.\""
